item.title: accept android sdk license
item.description: Build Error Message android app build failed, error message: > Failed to install the following Android SDK packages as some licences have not been accepted. build-tools;28.0.3 Android SDK Build-Tools 28.0.3 platforms;android-28 Android SDK Platform 28 To build this project, accept the SDK license agreements and install the missing components using the Android Studio SDK Manager. Alternatively, to transfer the license agreements from one workstation to another, see http://d.android.com/r/studio-ui/export-licenses.html Using Android SDK: /opt/android-sdk-linux Install Build-Tools 28.
